Author: sweetrarity23
Text: YESSSS! I straight up told my mother, sister, and sister in law that I used to restrict to 300 calories a day and if I went over, I’d immediately purge it and even dropped out of college because I was skipping class to go to the gym. They just went “oh” and went back to looking at their phones. Now this time around after relapsing, I know not to tell them so I don’t feel disappointed. But I suppose it’s good encouragement to continue since if I told them that I haven’t eaten in 3 days, they’d probably just say “good for you! I wish I could do  that!” But if I LOOKED like I had an eating disorder, it would be different.

Author: livcosima
Text: I RELATE WAY TOO HARD TO THIS I drop so many hints because I’m too scared to ask for help and get into recovery so I drop a lot of hints and try to make it somewhat obvious but no one notices or blows it off because I’m not skinny by any means and my bmi is technically overweight, 26.2 🙃
